courseDescription:
Get your C++ certification by exploring this practical C++ fundamentals free online course. You will explore why this programming language is so popular by being introduced to the history and standardization of C++ as well as the more intricate details such as what compilers and linkers are and their uses. Getting the basics of installation right is very important and your learning will include setting up a C++ Integrated Environment specifically within Microsoft Surface Studio and then the fundamentals of programming using C++ including practical demonstrations.


The next part of this free online C++ training discusses new features of C++ and C++ 11 including the concept of programming, characteristics of C++ and how to use C++ reference documentation. Once this is complete, the course discusses Code Efficiency and the important data types that are predefined in the standard C++ language. The last part of the content guides you through operations and operands to form expressions that produce results over a particular time and examples of different operators. You will also analyze code strings such as the uses of literal string, old style strings, new style string type objects and the very important process of getting user inputs.

If you are already in programming and want to add C++ to your skills or are just curious on how C++ works, then enrolling in this course will give you the fundamental training required to understand this popular language and its uses. The course is practical in nature and allows you to apply your learning from day one.
